presentation.description: I'm a french {age} year old programmer and I've been doing that since I was 8 years old, it's my
presentation.description-2: I started with Java, creating minecraft plugins and later on moved on to NodeJS. I'm a student at the Technological University of Mulhouse, France, studying Multimedia and Web Development, 2nd year.
presentation.description-3: I just love programming really, especially building new things that correlate to what I love in real life. For example, I'm planning on building a powerlifting app.
presentation.title: Hi. I'm Jordan.

meta.description: I talk about a lot of things that are, in my opinion, worthy to be shared.
meta.title: Blog

confirmHire: Great, you can contact me here:
Can I help you with anything else?
first: I'm Jordan Bot. I'm here to help you with your questions about Jordan.
What would you like to know?
hire: Send me a message and let's chat about it!
Oh, and, I'm looking for little personal side jobs, not full-time jobs.
looking: I'm glad you're interested in myself.
I hope you're enjoying my work.
Can I help you with anything else?
other: Can I help you with anything else?
teachHTMLCSS: Well, I strongly suggest this course from freeCodeCamp.
It's free, interactive and you will learn everything from basics to advanced stuff.
You can still contact me on my socials if you have any questions.
teachJS: Well, I strongly suggest this course from freeCodeCamp.
It's free, interactive and you will learn everything from basics to advanced stuff.
You can still contact me on my socials if you have any questions.
teachMe: Hum, sure, I'm not a teacher but I can give you resources or help you.
What do you want to learn?
teachSvelte: Svelte is a great framework, and I would say it is close to React.
You can check out this channel to learn more about React, and then implement it in Svelte.
Or, simply try to make a Svelte project and you'll learn a lot by doing it. A simple thing like a ToDo app is a good start.
You can still contact me on my socials if you have any questions.

meta.description: I'm a fullstack developer with a passion for building beautiful, performant and accessible web apps or websites.

about.description: Interested in development since I was a child, I started with the creation of minecraft plugins then I moved on to discord bots. As of today, I'm a web developer as you can see!
about.description-2: I'm currently in my second year of a bachelor's degree in Multimedia and Internet Jobs at the University of Technology of Mulhouse.
about.title: Me, Myself & I

meta.description: The privacy policy of KesvaL's website
meta.title: Privacy Policy

cookies.description: This website only uses one cookie, which is used to store an identifier for the user's session. This cookie is used to avoid our analytics from counting the same user multiple times. This cookie is not used for any other purpose, and is not shared with any third party other than Vercel.
cookies.description-2: As the CNIL (French Data Protection Authority) states, cookies are not permanent and never last longer than 13 months.
cookies.title: Cookies

thirdParty.description: The only third party this website uses is Vercel Analytics, which is used to track the number of visitors and the web vitals. Learn more about what data is collected
thirdParty.description-2: There is no intrusive tracking, and no data is shared with any other third party.
thirdParty.title: Third Party

list.description: I have a lot of things to learn. Knowledge is scattered on the internet, but I want a place to regroup everything, so I made this app. It allows me to track my skills and my progress, and it's all open-source.
list.name: SupaSkills
list.shortDescription: This is an app I made for myself, to track my skills and my progress.

list.description: I love going to the gym, but finding a good program can be hard or expensive. So I made SupaPower, an open-source app made to to help you track your workouts and create a program suited to your needs.
list.name: SupaPower
list.shortDescription: Track your workouts and find a program suited to your needs.

list.description: I think presentations can be really cool, but really hard to make. So I made this website to help me make them, using my methods. You can create interactive presentations with it, and it's all code-logic based.
list.name: Presentations
list.shortDescription: PowerPoint is boring. Create interactive presentations using code, you just need Svelte.

list.description: Web identity is important, and I think it's very cool to share things with the world. So I made this website to share my work and my thoughts.
list.name: Portfolio
list.shortDescription: My own website to share my work and my thoughts made with Typescript, SvelteKit, Sass and MDSveX.

meta.description: The full list of all of KesvaL's projects, right here
meta.title: Projects

about.description: I'm a passioned fullstack developer. I started when I was 8, writing my first lines of code in Java, creating minecraft mods. I then moved to web development, and I'm now working with the latest technologies, such as Svelte, Deno, and TypeScript. Later, I want to create some apps for myself, that will maybe be used by others.
about.title: About

education.description: I have a High School Diploma in Computer Science and Mathematics, and I'm currently studying at the University of Mulhouse, in Multimedia and Internet, where I'm learning about web development, 3D, video, and audio. I'm in my second year.
education.title: Education

experiences.description: Working for myself as a fullstack web developer. I'm open to work! I also create my own little things and open source them.
experiences.name: Freelance Dev

experiences.description: Frontend Developer, working on a lot of different projects, from small websites to big web applications.
experiences.name: OLWE Dev

experiences.description: Student in Multimedia and Internet at the University of Mulhouse. This is a 3-year degree, and is linked to my job at OLWE Development, I am doing an apprenticeship.
experiences.name: University

experiences.description: Student in computer science and mathematics.
experiences.name: High School
